name: Payroll
description: Think and Dev Paymentbox. Swap and transfer multiple ERC20 pairs to multiple accounts in a single transaction. Use any router address of any DEX that uses Uniswap protocol v2 or v3 to make swaps.

eventDecorators.name: BatchPayment
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when buy token price is changed.

eventDecorators.name: FeeAddressChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when buy token price is changed.

eventDecorators.name: FeeChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when buy token price is changed.

eventDecorators.name: FeeCharged
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when buy token price is changed.

eventDecorators.name: Initialized
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when buy token price is changed.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when buy token price is changed.

eventDecorators.name: SwapFinished
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when buy token price is changed.

eventDecorators.name: SwapRouterChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when buy token price is changed.

eventDecorators.name: UpdatedVersion
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when buy token price is changed.

functionDecorators.name: approveTokens
functionDecorators.description: Approves the following token to be used on swapRouter.

parameterDecorators.name: _erc20TokenOrigin
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 token address to approve.

parameterDecorators.name: _swapRouter
parameterDecorators.description: Router address to execute swaps.

parameterDecorators.name: _isSwapV2
parameterDecorators.description: Boolean to specify the version of the router; true means v2, false means v3.

functionDecorators.name: isSwapV2
functionDecorators.description: Returns if the contract is working with a v2 Uniswap protocol; true means v2, false means v3.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: performMultiPayment
functionDecorators.description: Perform the payments to the given addresses and amounts, public method.Available to send ETH or ERC20.

parameterDecorators.name: _payments
parameterDecorators.description: The array of the Payment data.

functionDecorators.name: performSwapV2
functionDecorators.description: Perform the swap with Uniswap V2 to the given token addresses and amounts.Swap ERC20 to ERC20.

parameterDecorators.name: _erc20TokenOrigin
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 token address to swap for another.

parameterDecorators.name: _totalAmountToSwap
parameterDecorators.description: Total amount of erc20TokenOrigin to spend in swaps.

parameterDecorators.name: _deadline
parameterDecorators.description: The unix timestamp after a swap will fail.

parameterDecorators.name: _swaps
parameterDecorators.description: The array of the Swaps data.

functionDecorators.name: performSwapV2AndPayment
functionDecorators.description: Perform the swap with Uniswap V2 and the transfer to the given addresses.Swap ERC20 to ERC20.Available to send ETH or ERC20.

parameterDecorators.name: _erc20TokenOrigin
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 token address to swap for another.

parameterDecorators.name: _totalAmountToSwap
parameterDecorators.description: Total amount of erc20TokenOrigin to spend in swaps.

parameterDecorators.name: _deadline
parameterDecorators.description: The unix timestamp after a swap will fail.

parameterDecorators.name: _swaps
parameterDecorators.description: The array of the Swaps data.

parameterDecorators.name: _payments
parameterDecorators.description: The array of the Payment data.

functionDecorators.name: performSwapV2AndPaymentETH
functionDecorators.description: Perform the swap with Uniswap V2 and the transfer to the given addresses.Swap ETH to ERC20.Available to send ETH or ERC20.

parameterDecorators.name: _totalAmountToSwap
parameterDecorators.description: Total amount of erc20TokenOrigin to spend in swaps.

parameterDecorators.name: _deadline
parameterDecorators.description: The unix timestamp after a swap will fail.

parameterDecorators.name: _swaps
parameterDecorators.description: The array of the Swaps data.

parameterDecorators.name: _payments
parameterDecorators.description: The array of the Payment data.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setFee
functionDecorators.description: Set the fee that will be charged, fees are divided by mantissa.

parameterDecorators.name: _fee
parameterDecorators.description: Percentage that will be charged.

functionDecorators.name: setFeeAddress
functionDecorators.description: Set the address that will receive the fees.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address that will receive the fees.

functionDecorators.name: setSwapRouter
functionDecorators.description: Set the SwapRouter and the version to be used.

parameterDecorators.name: _swapRouter
parameterDecorators.description: Router address to execute swaps.

parameterDecorators.name: _isSwapV2
parameterDecorators.description: Boolean to specify the version of the router; true means v2, false means v3.

functionDecorators.name: swapRouter
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the Uniswap protocol router, it could be v2 or v3.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
